channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT

item.title: Report X-2024080314
item.description:
Report X-2024080314

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-08T15:13:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-05
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Pkg missing required Hazmat PRP Certification. Class 9 diamond is covered/obscured. Pkg contains one motor vehicle air bag dropped off at a FedEx Express location by an automotive dealership for manufacturer's recall. Pkg picked up by station and forwarded to the next load point without proper handling of the pkg.

item.title: Report X-2024072297
item.description:
Report X-2024072297

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-06T15:14:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-28
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The box contains 6X18oz Aerosol cans of Rust-Oleum Striping Paint. The sipper covered up the limited quantity diamond with the barcode. The bottom of the box is ripped open and 1 can is missing. This is an undeclared hazmat.

item.title: Report X-2024072232
item.description:
Report X-2024072232

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-05T15:15:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-26
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Pkg shipped as fully regulated with only Ltd Qty diamond printed on outer carton. Pkg missing required Hazmat Certification and OP-900LL tear-away Hazmat tags. Pkg was dropped causing the side of 1 x 1 gal. plastic bottle to split approximately 4" on the side allowing the liquid to leak wetting and contaminating the contents and carton causing the carton to rip and contents to fall out.
